snippet: The dissidents had won official recognition as refugees and had been previously detained in China for their activism.
abstract: Thai government sends Chinese dissidents Jiang Yefei and Dong Guanping back home, despite men being granted official recognition as refugees; move, denounced by rights groups, reflects China's growing ability to pressure other countries to deny refuge to Chinese citizens.
lead_paragraph: The dissidents had won official recognition as refugees and had been previously detained in China for their activism.

headline.main: Thailand Deports 2 Dissidents to China, Rights Groups Say
headline.print_headline: Thailand Deports 2 Dissidents to China, Activists Say

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
